query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notificationPreferences (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  counties TEXT,
  minBid INT,
  maxBid INT,
  emailEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  inAppEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  frequency VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'immediate' NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notificationHistory (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  propertyId INT NOT NULL,
  type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  sentAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  readAt TIMESTAMP NULL
);
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  counties TEXT,
  minBid INT,
  maxBid INT,
  emailEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  inAppEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  frequency VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'immediate' NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notificationHistory (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  propertyId INT NOT NULL,
  type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  sentAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  readAt TIMESTAMP NULL
);
